text:
is a Japanese-American jazz musician. She is a pianist, composer, arranger and bandleader. She has been nominated for fourteen Grammy Awards. She was the first woman to win best arranger and composer awards in "DownBeat" magazine's annual readers' poll. In 1996, she published her autobiography, "Life with Jazz".
Akiyoshi was born in Liaoyang, Manchuria, China. After the end of World War II, she moved to Beppu with her family.
